name: VillageTour
description:
It's a relaxing walking simulator game that comes with a condition to unlock levels by eating coins. The following is the operation button and level process:

WASD controls forward, backward, left, and right movement, Space controls jumping, Q key can close the prompt, ESC can pause the game and open the menu.

This is a Unity3D walking simulator game I made using the model materials downloaded from Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/assets/page:2?q=3d). By eating the seven gold coins that exist on the map, you can Open the hidden platform to get the key to the top of the mountain, and use the key to open the lock to end the level.

Hope you can relax and enjoy it while playing, thanks。
